overview: Have you ever wondered what happens in a hotel room before you check-in? If the walls of your hotel room could talk, what sordid stories would they tell? When 11 horny studs arrive in ‘Room 106’, a seemingly random hotel room off the beaten path, they find themselves breeding holes raw and sucking huge cock. Join award-winning director Tony Dimarco and his all-star cast of men who pass through this otherwise plain hotel room, but leave having had unique, mind-blowing, intensely sexual experiences.
title: Room 106
